Title: Simple Chess
Description: A simple chess engine & UI implemented in C# and WPF.
HomeWiki:
Simple Chess

Investigations on building a simple chess board and engine, with focus on clear design patterns and an easy to understand design.

About the author
My name is Andrei Scripniciuc, and I'm a software developer from Cluj-Napoca, Romania. My personal blog: http://www.scripni.com.

External components used

  • Galasoft MVVM Light - http://www.galasoft.ch/mvvm/
  • Chess Icons from Peter Wong - http://www.virtualpieces.net/icons/

I'm currently looking for someone to help me with the UI/X design, please contact me if you want to be a contributor.
